## prepareCreateClusterUnsignedPsbt() function

Generates an unsigned PSBT (Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction) for creating a cluster. This function is used to estimate transaction fees before finalizing the transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
prepareCreateClusterUnsignedPsbt: ({ collector, clusterData, isMainnet, btcTestnetType, fromBtcAccount, fromBtcAccountPubkey, btcDataSource, outIndex, btcTxId, btcFeeRate, }: PrepareCreateClusterUnsignedPsbtParams) => Promise<bitcoin.Psbt>
```
